Description:
Our client is into Real Estate Industry. They are now looking for an Accountant to join them. Roles & Responsibilities:Manage all accounting transactions
Support with the reconciliation of multiple accounts
Identify issues and irregularities with accounting entries and classifications
Provide support on audit matters
Prepare budget forecasts
Reconcile accounts payable and receivableSkills
Skills:
Worked Extensively With Excel
Immediate Joiners
Sponsorship Visa Holders only

Excellent command of both written and spoken English
Proficient in computer literacy.
Proficient in any accounting software.
